relationships.description: Harry cuts across Luna, indicating their physical interaction.
Harry looks at Ron, showing his attention towards him.
Harry also looks at Hermione, indicating he is looking at her as well.
Ron mirrors Harry's disappointment back to him, showing a reciprocal relationship.
